title: Living tomorrow. No. 133
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Engineers compete with the elements to produce five million volts of man-made lightning and the feasibility of transmitting electricity at this huge voltage; a machine has been developed to take oil, hydraulic and brake-fluid, rubber, fuel and grit from surfaces of motorways; severely handicapped children are helped by projection of colored patterns.
